artist: Artist: Nelson Hall; Editor: Jim Flynn; Publisher: Curbside Press, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume featuring nine square portraits of houseless people living in New York City, with text, in blue ink; 310 pp.
title: Stranger to the System: Life portraits of a New York City homeless community
